o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: Check full shortcut mode is disabled on model (MDDE)
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: BurggraaffC
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that full shortcut mode is disabled on the model
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True 'If FullShortCut is true in model options, output an error message and fail the check If (obj.GetModelOptions().FullShortCut = True) Then WriteError "Please change the Model Options from Full Shortcut Model to Name/Code" %Check% = False End If End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
